title: Explore marketplace APIs for purchasing
description:
Research Amazon and other major marketplace APIs so BMO can make purchases for Dave as a personal shopper.

Explore:
- Amazon Product Advertising API / SP-API
- Other major marketplace APIs (Walmart, Target, Best Buy, etc.)
- What's possible: product search, price comparison, order placement
- Authentication requirements and limitations
- Any terms of service concerns with automated purchasing
- Practical approach for a personal shopping assistant

actions.note: Key finding: no major retailer has a public consumer purchasing API. New agentic commerce protocols emerging (OpenAI ACP + Stripe, Google UCP/AP2). Best near-term path: ACP for Stripe merchants, Instacart for groceries, browser automation (Skyvern) for everything else. Saved to .claude/state/research/marketplace-apis.md
